MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH11 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Slateford Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of this at 5:24AM. Our engineers are on their way to Harrison Gardens substation to investigate and repair the fault our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12PM. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:25AM on 14 February 2021
